reviewText:
As usual with Priyadarshan style, along with main plot ("Summer in Bethlehem" story) this movie has subplots or similar scenes from few of his old movies like scenes from Kilukkam, Cheppu, dialogues similar to his old comedy movies (like "Kailash Abdullah").

But The Acting is brilliant as everryone has played their role to perfection. Its a Really Good Tamil film and a jewel in Tamil cinema.
